metadata.title: Documenso - The Open Source DocuSign Alternative
metadata.description: Join Documenso, the open signing infrastructure, and get a 10x better signing experience. Pricing starts at $30/mo. forever! Sign in now and enjoy a faster, smarter, and more beautiful document signing process. Integrates with your favorite tools, customizable, and expandable. Support our mission and become a part of our open-source community.
metadata.keywords: Documenso, open source, DocuSign alternative, document signing, open signing infrastructure, open-source community, fast signing, beautiful signing, smart templates

blog.get_news: Get the latest news from Documenso, including product updates, team announcements and more!

announcement_bar.claim_profil: Claim your documenso public profile username now!

faster_smarter_beautiful.contract_promotion: When it comes to sending or receiving a contract, you can count on lightning-fast speeds.
faster_smarter_beautiful.celebrated_signing: Because signing should be celebrated. That’s why we care about the smallest detail in our product.
faster_smarter_beautiful.custom_templates: Our custom templates come with smart rules that can help you save time and energy.

share_connect_paid_widget.integrate: Integrates with all your favourite tools.
share_connect_paid_widget.everywhere: Send, connect, receive and embed everywhere.
share_connect_paid_widget.personal_link: Receive your personal link to share with everyone you care about.
share_connect_paid_widget.create_connections: Create connections and automations with Zapier and more to integrate with your favorite tools.
share_connect_paid_widget.integrated_payments: Integrated payments with Stripe so you don’t have to worry about getting paid.
share_connect_paid_widget.embed: Easily embed Documenso into your product. Simply copy and paste our react widget into your application.

open_build_template.up_to_you: It’s up to you. Either clone our repository or rely on our easy to use hosting solution.
open_build_template.make_it_your_own: Make it your own through advanced customization and adjustability.
open_build_template.choose_or_submit: Choose a template from the community app store. Or submit your own template for others to use.

pricing.designed: Designed for every stage of your journey.
pricing.none_work: None of these work for you? Try self-hosting!
pricing.self_hosted: Our self-hosted option is great for small teams and individuals who need a simple solution. You can use our docker based setup to get started in minutes. Take control with full customizability and data ownership.
pricing.plan_difference: What is the difference between the plans?
pricing.painless: You can self-host Documenso for free or use our ready-to-use hosted version. The hosted version comes with additional support, painless scalability and more. Early adopters will get access to all features we build this year, for no additional cost! Forever! Yes, that includes multiple users per account later. If you want Documenso for your enterprise, we are happy to talk about your needs.
pricing.handle_data: How do you handle my data?
pricing.securely: Securely. Our data centers are located in Frankfurt (Germany), giving us the best local privacy laws. We are very aware of the sensitive nature of our data and follow best practices to ensure the security and integrity of the data entrusted to us.
pricing.why_hosting: Why should I use your hosting service?
pricing.using_hosted: Using our hosted version is the easiest way to get started, you can simply subscribe and start signing your documents. We take care of the infrastructure, so you can focus on your business. Additionally, when using our hosted version you benefit from our trusted signing certificates which helps you to build trust with your customers.
pricing.awesome: That's awesome. You can take a look at the current
pricing.keep_up_to_date: to keep up to date, on what the current priorities are. In any case, we are an open community and welcome all input, technical and non-technical
pricing.under_the_gnu: Yes! Documenso is offered under the GNU AGPL V3 open source license. This means you can use it for free and even modify it to fit your needs, as long as you publish your changes under the same license.
pricing.why_documenso: Why should I prefer Documenso over DocuSign or some other signing tool?
pricing.vibrant_ecosystem: Documenso is a community effort to create an open and vibrant ecosystem around a tool, everybody is free to use and adapt. By being truly open we want to create trusted infrastructure for the future of the internet.
pricing.we_are_happy: We are happy to assist you at
pricing.please_message: please message either Lucas or Timur to get added to the channel if you are not already a member.
pricing.for_small_teams: For small teams and individuals with basic needs.
pricing.everything_you_need: Everything you need for a great signing experience.
pricing.for_companies: For companies looking to scale across multiple teams.
pricing.enterprise_compliance: Enterprise Compliance, License or Technical Needs?
pricing.our_entreprise: Our Enterprise License is great large organizations looking to switch to Documenso for all their signing needs. It's availible for our cloud offering as well as self-hosted setups and offer a wide range of compliance and Adminstration Features.
